mapper.select: SELECT c.comu_code, c.comu_subject, c.comu_content, c.created_date, c.modified_date, u.user_code, u.user_nick, IFNULL(b.bookmark_count, 0) AS bookmark_count FROM comu_post c JOIN user u ON c.user_code = u.user_code LEFT JOIN ( SELECT comu_code, COUNT(*) AS bookmark_count FROM bookmark GROUP BY comu_code ) b ON c.comu_code = b.comu_code WHERE c.del_status = false ORDER BY c.created_date DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset};

SELECT c.comu_code, c.comu_subject, c.comu_content, c.created_date, c.modified_date, u.user_code, u.user_nick, IFNULL(b.bookmark_count, 0) AS bookmark_count FROM comu_post c JOIN user u ON (c.user_code = u.user_code) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT comu_code, COUNT(*) AS bookmark_count FROM bookmark GROUP BY comu_code ) b ON c.comu_code = b.comu_code WHERE c.comu_code = #{comuPostCode} AND c.del_status = false

SELECT c.comu_code, c.comu_subject, c.comu_content, c.created_date, c.modified_date, u.user_code, u.user_nick, IFNULL(b.bookmark_count, 0) AS bookmark_count FROM comu_post c JOIN user u ON (c.user_code = u.user_code) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT comu_code, COUNT(*) AS bookmark_count FROM bookmark GROUP BY comu_code ) b ON c.comu_code = b.comu_code WHERE c.user_code = #{userCode} AND c.del_status = false
